results.name: a(n) = 4*n^3 - 6*n^2 + 1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
mathematica: Table[EulerE[3,n],{n,0,50}]*4; (* and/or *) Array[4*#^3-6*#^2+1&,50,0] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 03 2009 *)
program: (Sage) [4*n^3 -6*n^2 +1 for n in (0..50)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 29 2021
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 12 2008
